wikipedia_page.main: Brian Mark Blackwell (born 1986) is a British man who, aged 18 years old, killed his parents by stabbing and beating them with a carving knife and claw hammer in their home near Liverpool, England on 25 July 2004.Although his trial judge said that it would "unlikely ever" be safe enough to free him, Blackwell was granted release on parole in 2016.

response: * Brian Blackwell (born 1986), English schoolboy convicted of the manslaughter of his parents
